caption.p: A and C, Distribution of febrile respiratory illness (FRI) episodes overall and those due to enterovirus/rhinovirus, adenovirus, and coronavirus, by calendar time ( A) and week after basis military training (BMT) enlistment ( C). B and D, Distribution of FRI episodes due to any influenza virus, 2009 pandemic influenza A(H1N1) virus (A[H1N1]pdm09), influenza A(H3N2) virus, and influenza B virus, by calendar time ( B) and week after BMT enlistment ( D). Gray shading denotes the period when trivalent influenza vaccine was routinely administered to incoming recruits.
